summary.para: The HTTP_CONNECTION_LIMIT_INFO structure is used to set or query the limit on the maximum number of outstanding connections for a URL Group.
This structure must be used when setting or querying the on a URL Group.

member.name: HTTP_CONNECTION_LIMIT_INFO.Flags
member.summary: The structure specifying whether the property is present.

member.name: HTTP_CONNECTION_LIMIT_INFO.MaxConnections
member.summary: The number of connections allowed. Setting this value to HTTP_LIMIT_INFINITE allows an unlimited number of connections.
